name: Payments from annuity savings fund
text: §88-113  Payments from annuity savings fund.  Any lump sum payment of a member's contributions shall be charged against the annuity savings fund.  When a member retires, the member's accumulated contributions shall be transferred from the annuity savings fund to the pension accumulation fund. [L 1925, c 55, pt of §8; RL 1935, pt of §7927; RL 1945, pt of §712, subs 1; RL 1955, §6-85; am L 1963, c 127, §18; HRS §88-103; am L 1969, c 110, pt of §1; gen ch 1985]
